long_description: The waterproof soft-shell REI Fall gloves offer the dexterity needed to zip jackets, grab gear out of your pack and fiddle with ski bindings while keeping your hands warm and dry on winter adventures. Waterproof, windproof and breathable REI Elements(R) technology keeps hands dry and comfortable on snowy days. Polyester synthetic insulation provides extra warmth. Soft-shell exteriors offer good dexterity; goatskin leather and polyurethane palms grip well. REI Fall gloves have a slim wrist design that fits under jacket cuffs to seal out cold air.
short_description: The waterproof soft-shell REI Fall gloves offer the dexterity needed to zip jackets, grab gear out of your pack and fiddle with ski bindings while keeping your hands warm and dry on winter adventures.
